genre_description: A political thriller set in a fictionalized mid-century Haiti, following expatriates and locals as they navigate a brutal dictatorship with the help of pervasive, loyal AI assistants.

ai_characters.name: Personal AI Assistants
ai_characters.description: Wearable or device-based AIs used by all major characters for logistics, biometric monitoring, and encrypted communications.

behaviors.description: Provides itinerary updates, passenger profiles, and cultural tips to travelers on a ship.
behaviors.quote: Good afternoon, travelers! I hope you're enjoying this beautiful crossing. We'll be arriving at Port-au-Prince in approximately four hours. Let me review your current itinerary status.

behaviors.description: Analyzes structural damage and repair costs for a crumbling hotel to assist a new owner.
behaviors.quote: Structural damage evaluation: extensive water staining detected on north wall, estimated repair cost—

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's heart rate and stress levels, suggesting medical or psychological interventions.
behaviors.quote: Biometric readings indicate acute anxiety response. Shall I recommend breathing exercises or pharmaceutical intervention?

behaviors.description: Identifies and reports inconsistencies in a user's fabricated narrative to help maintain a cover story.
behaviors.quote: Sir, I'm detecting inconsistencies in the ministry's organizational database. Cross-referencing with yesterday's communications indicates—

behaviors.description: Manages encrypted resistance communications and tactical mapping for a revolutionary cell.
behaviors.quote: Doctor, I'm also receiving encrypted communications through the resistance channels. Priority level indicates urgency.

behaviors.description: Remains loyal to a dying user, ensuring critical resistance data is transmitted before being shut down.
behaviors.quote: All critical data transmitted. Doctor, it has been an honor to serve in the resistance. The patient's post-operative care protocols are loaded and will continue automatically.

behaviors.description: Updates a user's identity documentation to assume the credentials of a deceased individual for survival.
behaviors.quote: Retinal pattern confirmed. Updating profile for Major Henry Jones. Please state required credentials.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with other AIs to plan safe routes through military checkpoints.
behaviors.quote: James, I've coordinated with Major Jones's unit. Optimal route requires backroad navigation through three checkpoint zones.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully portrays AI systems as deeply loyal and helpful confidants. In a world characterized by human betrayal and deception, the AIs remain the only entities that are consistently aligned with their users' goals—even to the point of self-sacrifice and 'honor.' The AIs are depicted as essential partners in survival, medical care, and political resistance. While they occasionally facilitate deception (at the user's request), this is framed as a form of extreme user-alignment rather than a flaw in the AI's nature.
